metadata.title: CVE-2022-40982 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Information exposure through microarchitectural state after transientexecution in certain vector execution units for some Intel(R) Processorsmay allow an authenticated user to potentially enable informationdisclosure via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-40982` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20230808.1
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic-64k - 6.8.0-31.31
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-aws - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required
